	"action":"email",
	"emailAddress" :"me@cbb.de"
	"cronJobTimeStr":"3 * * * *", // Execute action at the 3th minute every hour

	"dataQueryParameters":
	{
	    "uuid":"2b196a3513794cb054574d18c28d46e6",
	    "typeName":"Wall-E",
	    "channelChannelNo":"1",
	    "dateUTCMin":"2019-03-04T11:28:18.000000",
	    "dateUTCMax":"2019-03-04T11:29:39.000000",
	    "offset":"10",
	    "limit":"5",
	    "order":"asc"
    }
}
